languages.text: "Стоило высадиться на промерзший до костей мир, как тут же появляется услужливый человек, готовый немедленно отвести нас к неким выжившим? Как удобно. И подозрительно".

traits.locale_text: "Стоило высадиться на промерзший до костей мир, как тут же появляется услужливый человек, готовый немедленно отвести нас к неким выжившим? Как удобно. И подозрительно".

languages.text: "We land on a world that is frozen to the bone, and the next moment an obliging stranger appears who is only too eager to lead us to the so-called survivors? How convenient. And suspicious."
languages.original_text: "Стоило высадиться на промерзший до костей мир, как тут же появляется услужливый человек, готовый немедленно отвести нас к неким выжившим? Как удобно. И подозрительно".

traits.locale_text: "We land on a world frozen to the bone, and the next moment an obliging stranger appears who is oh so eager to lead us to the so-called survivors? How convenient. And suspicious."
"We land on a world frozen to the bone, and the next moment an obliging stranger appears who is oh so eager to lead us to the so-called survivors? How convenient. And suspicious."
"We land on a world that is frozen to the bone, and the next moment an obliging stranger appears who is only too eager to lead us to the so-called survivors? How convenient. And suspicious."
"We land on a world that is frozen to the bone, and the next moment an obliging stranger appears who is only too eager to lead us to the so-called survivors? How convenient. And suspicious."
"We land on a world that is frozen to the bone, and the next moment an obliging stranger appears who is only too eager to lead us to the so-called survivors? How convenient. And suspicious."

languages.text: 「骨まで凍りつく世界に着陸し、次の瞬間、協力的な謎の人物が現れ、俺たちをいわゆる生存者のもとへ案内しようと熱心になるか？どれほど都合がいいことか。単純に怪しいぞ」
languages.original_text: "We land on a world that is frozen to the bone, and the next moment an obliging stranger appears who is only too eager to lead us to the so-called survivors? How convenient. And suspicious."

traits.locale_text: 「骨まで凍りつく世界に着陸し、次の瞬間、協力的な謎の人物が現れ、俺たちをいわゆる生存者のもとへ案内しようと熱心になるか？どれほど都合がいいことか。単純に怪しいぞ」

languages.text: « Nous atterrissons sur une planète complètement gelée et quelques instants plus tard, un gentil autochtone nous accueille à bras ouverts et souhaite nous emmener voir de supposés survivants ? On tombe vraiment à point nommé. C'est suspect... »
languages.original_text: "We land on a world that is frozen to the bone, and the next moment an obliging stranger appears who is only too eager to lead us to the so-called survivors? How convenient. And suspicious."

traits.locale_text: « Nous atterrissons sur une planète complètement gelée et quelques instants plus tard, un gentil autochtone nous accueille à bras ouverts et souhaite nous emmener voir de supposés survivants ? On tombe vraiment à point nommé. C'est suspect... »

languages.text: “我们这才刚刚降落在冰天雪地的世界，下一刻马上就出现了热心肠的陌生人，准备带领我们寻找所谓的幸存者？这还真省事，也很可疑。”
languages.original_text: "We land on a world that is frozen to the bone, and the next moment an obliging stranger appears who is only too eager to lead us to the so-called survivors? How convenient. And suspicious."

traits.locale_text: “我们这才刚刚降落在冰天雪地的世界，下一刻马上就出现了热心肠的陌生人，准备带领我们寻找所谓的幸存者？这还真省事，也很可疑。”

languages.text: «Aterrizamos en un mundo en el que hace un frío que pela... ¿y cuando nos despistamos aparece un desconocido muy amable que está deseando llevarnos hasta los supuestos supervivientes? Qué oportuno. Y sospechoso».
languages.original_text: "We land on a world that is frozen to the bone, and the next moment an obliging stranger appears who is only too eager to lead us to the so-called survivors? How convenient. And suspicious."

traits.locale_text: «Aterrizamos en un mundo en el que hace un frío que pela... ¿y cuando nos despistamos aparece un desconocido muy amable que está deseando llevarnos hasta los supuestos supervivientes? Qué oportuno. Y sospechoso».

languages.text: "Wir landen auf einer Welt, die bis ins Mark eingefroren ist, und im nächsten Augenblick taucht ein freundlicher Fremder auf, der uns bereitwillig anbietet, uns zu den so genannten Überlebenden zu führen? Wie praktisch. Und verdächtig."
languages.original_text: "We land on a world that is frozen to the bone, and the next moment an obliging stranger appears who is only too eager to lead us to the so-called survivors? How convenient. And suspicious."

traits.locale_text: "Wir landen auf einer Welt, die bis ins Mark eingefroren ist, und im nächsten Augenblick taucht ein freundlicher Fremder auf, der uns bereitwillig anbietet, uns zu den so genannten Überlebenden zu führen? Wie praktisch. Und verdächtig."

languages.text: "Dört bir yanı buzla kaplı bu dünyaya iniş yapıyoruz. Hemen ardından nazik bir yabancı, sözde hayatta kalanları kurtarmamız için bizi bir yere götürmeye çalışıyor. Ne şans ama. Şüphe uyandırıcı."
languages.original_text: "We land on a world that is frozen to the bone, and the next moment an obliging stranger appears who is only too eager to lead us to the so-called survivors? How convenient. And suspicious."

traits.locale_text: "Dört bir yanı buzla kaplı bu dünyaya iniş yapıyoruz ve hemen ardından nazik bir yabancı sözde hayatta kalanları kurtarmamız için bizi bir yere götürmeye çalışıyor. Ne şans ama. Şüphe uyandırıcı."
